properties.name: badou.request.enabled
properties.description: 是否开启API合法性校验，默认开启.

properties.name: badou.request.legal-time
properties.description: 合法请求时间间隔，默认60S.

properties.name: badou.useDebugger.enabled
properties.description: 是否开启调试模式，默认关闭.

properties.name: badou.request.cross.allow
properties.description: 允许跨域域名配置,默认为空.

properties.name: spring.cache.default-timeout
properties.description: 缓存默认有效时间，默认60分钟.

properties.name: logging.contextName
properties.description: 日志文件名.

properties.name: jwt.tokenHeader
properties.description: JWT存储的请求头.

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: JWT加解密使用的密钥.

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT的超期限时间（单位：秒）.

properties.name: jwt.tokenHead
properties.description: JWT负载中拿到开头.

properties.name: jasypt.boot.admin.client.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用Spring Boot Admin Client.

properties.name: jasypt.boot.admin.client.instance.service-base-url
properties.description: 本地的ip和项目端口.

properties.name: jasypt.boot.admin.client.instance.name
properties.description: SpringBootAdmin 实例名.

properties.name: jasypt.boot.admin.client.url
properties.description: Spring Boot Admin Server的URL.

properties.name: spring.jpa.cache.ehcache.config
properties.description: ehcache配置文件.

properties.name: spring.jpa.cache.type
properties.description: 缓存类型.

properties.name: spring.redis.enabled
properties.description: 是否开启Redis，默认开启.

properties.name: spring.cache.badou-cache.loadPanelAndBlock
properties.description: 读取面板下块数据的缓存有效期，默认60分钟.

properties.name: spring.cache.badou-cache.getReportData
properties.description: 块的报表数据缓存有效期，默认60分钟.

properties.name: jasypt.boot.admin.client.instance.prefer-ip
properties.description: 展示实际IP.

properties.name: spring.jpa.hibernate.dialect
properties.description: Hibernate指定数据库方言类.

properties.name: spring.jpa.hibernate.naming-strategy
properties.description: Hibernate命名策略.

properties.name: message.email.switch
properties.description: 邮件控制开关.

properties.name: badou.attachconf.path.tesserDataPathcn
properties.description: tesseract-ocr文件路径，默认为空.

properties.name: badou.request.excludes.login
properties.description: 要在登录拦截器中排除验证是否登录的URI,多个用“;” 追加即可,默认为空.

properties.name: badou.request.excludes.nonce
properties.description: 绕过API安全性校验中的nonce参数校验URI，多个用“;”追加即可,默认为空.

properties.name: badou.request.excludes.sign
properties.description: 绕过API安全性校验中的sign参数校验URI，多个用“;”追加即可,默认为空.

properties.name: badou.rsa.public-key-path
properties.description: 公钥存储路径.

properties.name: badou.rsa.private-key-path
properties.description: 私钥存储路径.

properties.name: badou.oauth2.client-id
properties.description: 客户端标识，默认与当前应用名称一致.

properties.name: badou.oauth2.client-secret
properties.description: 客户端秘钥，默认与当前应用名称一致.

properties.name: badou.oauth2.token.timeout
properties.description: Token过期时间，默认为1个小时（单位秒）.

properties.name: badou.oauth2.token.refresh-timeout
properties.description: Token刷新过期时间，默认为1个小时（单位秒）.

properties.name: badou.oauth2.mobile.client-id
properties.description: 移动客户端标识，默认为当前应用名称-mobile.

properties.name: badou.oauth2.token.mobile.timeout
properties.description: Token过期时间，默认为30天（单位秒）.

properties.name: badou.oauth2.token.mobile.refresh-timeout
properties.description: Token刷新过期时间，默认为30天（单位秒）.

properties.name: badou.oauth2.token.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用Token登录校验，默认为启用.

properties.name: badou.oauth2.auth-center-url
properties.description: 认证服务访问地址.

properties.name: badou.cache.panel-enabled
properties.description: 是否开启面板缓存,默认为false.

properties.name: badou.cas.enabled
properties.description: 是否开启CAS,默认为false.

properties.name: badou.cas.front-url
properties.description: 前端访问地址，用于通过CAS验证后进行页面回调.

properties.name: badou.security.xss.regular
properties.description: XSS和SQL过滤条件正则，以;号区分.

properties.name: badou.security.xss.exclude-field-name
properties.description: XSS和SQL不过滤字段名，以;号区分.

properties.name: badou.security.host
properties.description: 允许的合法请求头HOST，以;号区分.
